basic_information.scholarship_name: Guthrie Scottish Rite Charitable & Education Foundation Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Guthrie Scottish Rite Scholarship Committee

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in Education. Eligibility Requirements This scholarship is open to any student majoring in education & preparing to become a teacher Must be enrolled full-time Â– (12) hours undergraduate, (9) hours graduate Must be a junior, senior, or graduate status Minimum 3.0 GPA U.S. Citizen and Oklahoma resident Demonstrates financial need Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
